scripts.install:all: npm install --prefix backend && npm install --prefix frontend
scripts.dev:backend: cd backend && npx prisma generate && npx nodemon src/index.ts
scripts.dev:frontend: cd frontend && rm -rf .next && npm run dev
scripts.dev: npm run dev:backend & npm run dev:frontend
scripts.db:setup: cd backend && npx prisma db push && npx prisma db seed
scripts.clean: rm -rf backend/node_modules frontend/node_modules backend/dist frontend/.next package-lock.json backend/package-lock.json frontend/package-lock.json
scripts.start:local: npm run install:all && npm run db:setup && npm run dev
scripts.test:security:gate: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
